ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
numpy:
- '2'
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version

about.description:
The Snowflake Connector for Python provides an interface for
developing Python applications that can connect to Snowflake
and perform all standard operations. It provides a programming
alternative to developing applications in Java or C/C++ using
the Snowflake JDBC or ODBC drivers.

The Snowflake Connector for Python provides an interface for
developing Python applications that can connect to Snowflake
and perform all standard operations. It provides a programming
alternative to developing applications in Java or C/C++ using
the Snowflake JDBC or ODBC drivers.

The Snowflake Connector for Python provides an interface for
developing Python applications that can connect to Snowflake
and perform all standard operations. It provides a programming
alternative to developing applications in Java or C/C++ using
the Snowflake JDBC or ODBC drivers.

The Snowflake Connector for Python provides an interface for
developing Python applications that can connect to Snowflake
and perform all standard operations. It provides a programming
alternative to developing applications in Java or C/C++ using
the Snowflake JDBC or ODBC drivers.

name: snowflake-connector-python

about.description:
The Snowflake Connector for Python provides an interface for
developing Python applications that can connect to Snowflake
and perform all standard operations. It provides a programming
alternative to developing applications in Java or C/C++ using
the Snowflake JDBC or ODBC drivers.

The Snowflake Connector for Python provides an interface for
developing Python applications that can connect to Snowflake
and perform all standard operations. It provides a programming
alternative to developing applications in Java or C/C++ using
the Snowflake JDBC or ODBC drivers.

raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  name: snowflake-connector-python
  version: "4.1.1"

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/snowflakedb/${{ name }}/archive/refs/tags/v${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 9a03043eb33c7725036d8cc9b8439e1db0a742e7df6afa926379b820608a47f8

build:
  number: 0
  python:
    entry_points:
      - snowflake-dump-ocsp-response = snowflake.connector.tool.dump_ocsp_response:main
      - snowflake-dump-ocsp-response-cache = snowflake.connector.tool.dump_ocsp_response_cache:main
      - snowflake-dump-certs = snowflake.connector.tool.dump_certs:main
      - snowflake-export-certs = snowflake.connector.tool.export_certs:main
  dynamic_linking:
    rpaths:
      - lib
      - ${{ PREFIX }}/lib
      - if: unix
        then: ${{ SP_DIR }}/pyarrow
      - if: win
        then: ${{ SP_DIR }}\pyarrow

requirements:
  build:
    - if: build_platform != target_platform
      then:
        - python
        - cross-python_${{ target_platform }}
        - cython
        - numpy
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
    - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - setuptools
    - cython
    - numpy
    - packaging
  run:
    - python
    - asn1crypto >0.24.0,<2.0.0
    - boto3 >=1.24
    - botocore >=1.24
    - cffi >=1.9,<2.0.0
    - cryptography >=44.0.1
    - pyOpenSSL >=24.0.0,<26.0.0
    - pyjwt >=2.10.1,<3.0.0
    - pytz
    - requests >=2.32.4,<3.0.0
    - packaging
    - charset-normalizer >=2,<4
    - idna >=3.7,<4
    - certifi >=2024.7.4
    - typing_extensions >=4.3,<5
    - filelock >=3.5,<4
    - sortedcontainers >=2.4.0
    - platformdirs >=2.6.0,<5.0.0
    - tomlkit
  run_constraints:
    - pandas >=2.1.2,<3

tests:
  - python:
      pip_check: true
      imports:
        - snowflake
        - snowflake.connector
        - snowflake.connector.nanoarrow_arrow_iterator

about:
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  summary: Snowflake Connector for Python
  description: |
    The Snowflake Connector for Python provides an interface for
    developing Python applications that can connect to Snowflake
    and perform all standard operations. It provides a programming
    alternative to developing applications in Java or C/C++ using
    the Snowflake JDBC or ODBC drivers.
  homepage: https://github.com/snowflakedb/snowflake-connector-python
  repository: https://github.com/snowflakedb/snowflake-connector-python
  documentation: https://docs.snowflake.net/manuals/user-guide/python-connector.html

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - hajapy
    - talues
    - xhochy
    - mariusvniekerk
    - fhoehle

about.description:
The Snowflake Connector for Python provides an interface for
developing Python applications that can connect to Snowflake
and perform all standard operations. It provides a programming
alternative to developing applications in Java or C/C++ using
the Snowflake JDBC or ODBC drivers.
